Self.Wiki: Determines the behavior parameters used when triggering projectiles and attacks.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Exclude from the product version or mark the items to be excluded.

variationId.Wiki: Used when calculating the ID for attack parameters. It is not used directly on the actual machine.

behaviorJudgeId.Wiki: Used when calculating the ID for attack parameters. This ID matches the action judgment ID entered in TAE.

refType.Wiki: Which param type to reference for attack behavior.

consumeSA.Wiki: Set the amount of Poise consumed during action

refId.Wiki: ID of param to use for attack behavior. Param used determined by refType

sfxVariationId.Wiki: Offset applied to the particle ID invoked in the TAE event

stamina.Wiki: Set the amount of stamina consumed during action

energy.Wiki: Set the amount of energy consumed during action

mp.Wiki: Set the amount of MP consumed during action

category.Wiki: The SpEffect category this behavior belongs to

heroPoint.Wiki: Set the amount of humanity consumed during action

shootDmyPolyId.AltName: Firing: Dummy Polygon Range Start ID
shootDmyPolyId.Wiki: The starting ID in a range of Dummy Polygons used for shooting.

shootEndDmyPolyId.AltName: Firing: Dummy Polygon Range End ID
shootEndDmyPolyId.Wiki: The ending ID in a range of Dummy Polygons used for shooting.

shootAngle.Wiki: Specifies how far forward the projectile should be fired. In degrees.

shootAngleInterval.Wiki: When firing multiple projectiles, specify the interval at which to fire. (Y axis). In degrees.

shootAngleXZ.Wiki: Additional elevation angle from horizontal. In degrees.

bUseNumShootBullet.AltName: Consume Multiple Bullets when Firing Simultaneously
bUseNumShootBullet.Wiki: Consumes bullets for several times when fired simultaneously

isSequenceShootWhenSameTimeShoot.AltName: Fire Sequentially even when Firing Simultaneously
isSequenceShootWhenSameTimeShoot.Wiki: When firing sequentially using multiple dummy polys, are bullets fired at the same time considered to be fired sequentially?

isShootAngOffsetDisable.AltName: Apply Offset only to Guided Targets
isShootAngOffsetDisable.Wiki: When OFF, offset is also applied to the shooting angle; when ON, offset is disabled.

shootAngleXInterval.Wiki: When firing multiple projectiles, specify the interval at which to fire.(X-axis). In degrees.

shootAngleZ.Wiki: Specifies how many times to rotate in the Z-axis direction when launching a projectile. In degrees.

shootAngleZInterval.Wiki: When firing multiple projectiles, specify the interval at which to fire (Z-axis). In degrees.

bulletRollAngleZ.Wiki: Additional angle in drilling direction (Z axis). In degrees.

bulletRollAngleZInterbal.Wiki: When firing multiple projectiles, specify the interval at which to fire (Z-axis). In degrees.

bulletRollAngleZRandom.AltName: Firing: Firing Roll Angle - Random Max (Z-Axis)
bulletRollAngleZRandom.Wiki: Upper limit of firing torsion angle random number (0 to 360)

shootTargetXOffset.Wiki: Left and right offset of impact position. Shifts the target position left and right during firing and homing. In metres.

targetYOffsetRange.Wiki: Vertical offset of impact position. Shifts the target position up and down during firing and homing. In metres.

shootTargetZOffset.Wiki: Front and rear offset of impact position. Shifts the target position forward and backward during firing and homing.

numShoot.Wiki: Number of bullets produced per cartridge (emitter). Does not affect ammo consumption

numContinueShoot.Wiki: Number of times to fire continuously. The total number of bullets fired is the number of simultaneous shots x the number of consecutive shots.

cupsleRotationDeg.Wiki: Rotation angle of horizontal capsule. In degrees.

shootInterval.Wiki: Number of seconds between shots when firing continuously

reloadTimeSecond.Wiki: Interval between one shot and the next shot

targetZOffsetRange.Wiki: Forward and backward offset of the impact position for curved shots. Shifts the target position toward the front or back during firing and homing. In metres.

targetXOffsetRange.Wiki: Left and right offset of the impact position for curved shots. Shifts the target position toward the front or back during firing and homing. In metres.

bTargetAutoOffset.Wiki: Should you use automatic target position offset?

targetAutoOffsetBaseDmyPolyId.AltName: Target Position Automatic Offset: Dummy Polygon ID
targetAutoOffsetBaseDmyPolyId.Wiki: Reference dummy poly ID used in target position automatic offset

pa_DrainVal.Wiki: Set the amount of pulse armor consumed during action

pa_OverwriteDelayTimeSec.AltName: Pulse Armor: Recovery Delay Time Override
pa_OverwriteDelayTimeSec.Wiki: Amount to override Pulse Armor recovery time (-1 means no override)

consumeBulletNum.Wiki: Number of ammunition consumed when an attack occurs

lockTimeSec.Wiki: Time to secondary lock. In seconds.

shootEnableLockNum.Wiki: If the lock count number is less than the specified value, firing will not be possible.

HdPadRumble_Hit_Id.Wiki: Impact vibration ID for haptic feedback

HdPadRumble_Priority.Wiki: Playback priority for haptic feedback (0 is low priority, 10 is high priority)

heat_AddValue.Wiki: Heat value accumulated with each bullet

chargeDelayTimeSec.Wiki: Delay time until charging starts after referring to action parameters. In seconds.

continueShootConsumeBulletMaxTimeSec.AltName: Consecutive Firing: Ammunition Consumption Max Time
continueShootConsumeBulletMaxTimeSec.Wiki: Maximum time of bullets consumed by continuous consumption. In seconds.

continueShootAddHeatMaxTimeSec.AltName: Consecutive Firing: Heat Accumulation Max Time
continueShootAddHeatMaxTimeSec.Wiki: Maximum amount of heat accumulated through continuous consumption. In seconds.

continueShootAddHeatMaxValue.Wiki: Maximum amount of heat accumulated through continuous consumption

lockCountUpTimeSec.Wiki: Missile lock count up time (lock time from 2nd lock). In seconds.
